titleStmt.title: The tryal and conviction of Sr. Sam. Barnardiston, Bart. for high misdemeanor at the session of nisi prius holden at Guild-Hall, London, for His Majesties Court of Kings Bench before the Right Honorable Sir George Jeffreys ... lord chief justice of England on Thursday, Feb. 14, 1683.
titleStmt.author: Barnardiston, Samuel, Sir, 1620-1707.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Trial for sedition connected with Rye House Plot.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
